edu.cpp.cs.cs141.finalProject

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.finalProject.Square
      • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.finalProject.Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Room
extends Square
    This class represents the rooms in game. One of them will contain the briefcase or gre4ka that lead to victory.
    See Also:
